Package org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

Class LabelAnnotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.AbstractNode
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.AbstractAnnotation
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.AbstractPointedAnnotation
            • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.LabelAnnotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBackgroundColor, HasBorderOptions, HasBorderRadius, HasEventsHandler, HasExtendedBorderOptions, HasExtendedShadowOptions, HasLabel, HasRotation, HasShadowOptions, HasTextStrokeOptions, IsDefaultsAbstractPointedAnnotation, IsDefaultsAnnotation, IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler, IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler, IsDefaultsBorderRadiusHandler, IsDefaultsEventsHandler, IsDefaultsExtendedBorderOptionsHandler, IsDefaultsExtendedShadowOptionsHandler, IsDefaultsLabelAnnotation, IsDefaultsLabelHandler, IsDefaultsRotationHandler, IsDefaultsShadowOptionsHandler, IsDefaultsTextStrokeOptionsHandler, IsScriptableFontProvider<AnnotationContext>, IsScriptablePaddingProvider<AnnotationContext>
    public final class LabelAnnotation
extends AbstractPointedAnnotation
implements IsDefaultsLabelAnnotation, HasLabel, HasBorderRadius, HasExtendedBorderOptions, HasRotation, HasTextStrokeOptions
    Implements a LABEL annotation which draws a content in the a chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
        LabelAnnotation()
      Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance.
      The annotation id is calculated automatically.
        LabelAnnotation​(String id)
      Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
        LabelAnnotation​(String id, IsChart chart)
      Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
      The chart instance, passed as argument, must be the chart where the annotations will be applied and is used to get the whole default options in order to get the default for this object.
        LabelAnnotation​(AnnotationId id)
      Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
      private LabelAnnotation​(AnnotationId id, IsDefaultsAnnotation defaultValues)
      Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the native object and defaults passed as argument.
        LabelAnnotation​(AnnotationId id, IsChart chart)
      Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
      The chart instance, passed as argument, must be the chart where the annotations will be applied and is used to get the whole default options in order to get the default for this object.
      (package private) LabelAnnotation​(NativeObject nativeObject, IsDefaultsAnnotation defaultValues)
      Creates the object wrapping an existing native object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LabelAnnotation

        public LabelAnnotation()
        Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance.
        The annotation id is calculated automatically.
        See Also:
        AnnotationType.createId()

      • LabelAnnotation

        public LabelAnnotation​(String id)
        Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        id - annotation id to apply to the object, as string

      • LabelAnnotation

        public LabelAnnotation​(AnnotationId id)
        Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        id - annotation id to apply to the object

      • LabelAnnotation

        public LabelAnnotation​(String id,
                       IsChart chart)
        Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
        The chart instance, passed as argument, must be the chart where the annotations will be applied and is used to get the whole default options in order to get the default for this object.
        Parameters:
        id - annotation id to apply to the object, as string
        chart - chart instance related to the plugin options

      • LabelAnnotation

        public LabelAnnotation​(AnnotationId id,
                       IsChart chart)
        Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the ID passed as argument.
        The chart instance, passed as argument, must be the chart where the annotations will be applied and is used to get the whole default options in order to get the default for this object.
        Parameters:
        id - annotation id to apply to the object
        chart - chart instance related to the plugin options

      • LabelAnnotation

        private LabelAnnotation​(AnnotationId id,
                        IsDefaultsAnnotation defaultValues)
        Creates a label annotation to be added to an AnnotationOptions instance, using the native object and defaults passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        id - annotation id to apply to the object
        defaultValues - default options instance

        defaultValues - default options instance
